SectionBody.Text: The term “person entitled to enforce” an instrument means:

Subsection.Text: A nonholder in possession of the instrument who has the rights of a holder; or
A person not in possession of the instrument who is entitled to enforce the instrument pursuant to s. 673.3091 or s. 673.4181(4).

SectionBody.Text: A person may be a person entitled to enforce the instrument even though the person is not the owner of the instrument or is in wrongful possession of the instrument.
